attributes.name: ASSIGNMENT_ACTION_CODE
attributes.description: Person's primary assignment's action code i.e. HIRE

attributes.name: ASSIGNMENT_BUSINESS_UNIT_ID
attributes.description: Person's primary assignment business unit id

attributes.name: ASSIGNMENT_EFFECTIVE_START_DATE
attributes.description: Person's primary assignment effective start date.

attributes.name: ASSIGNMENT_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE
attributes.description: Person's primary assignment effective end date

attributes.name: ASSIGNMENT_STATUS_TYPE_ID
attributes.description: Person's primary assignment status type Id

attributes.name: LEGAL_ENTITY_ID
attributes.description: Id of legal employer's legal entity

attributes.name: WORK_TELEPHONE
attributes.description: Person's telephone number of type work

attributes.name: WORK_MOBILE
attributes.description: Person's mobile number of type work

attributes.name: FUTURE_DATE
attributes.description: Person's future hire or termination date

connectionParameters.beforeRule: Oracle HCM WS Before Aggregation Operation
Oracle HCM WS Before Aggregation Operation

connectorAttributes.source-config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Form xmlns="http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_1_0.xsd" name="Web Services" connectorName="Web Services" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released">
  <Field name="cloudAuthEnabled" type="boolean" hidden="true" defaultValue="true"/>
  <Section label="AUTH_SETTINGS" layout="vertical">
    <Section layout="horizontal">
      <Section layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="authenticationMethod" type="String" required="true" defaultValue="BasicLogin">
          <AllowedValues>
            <Option value="BasicLogin" label="Basic"/>
            <Option value="OAuth2Login" label="OAUTH_2"/>
            <Option value="OAuthLogin" label="API_TOKEN"/>
            <Option value="No Auth" label="No_Auth"/>
          </AllowedValues>
        </Field>
      </Section>
    </Section>
    <Section layout="horizontal">
      <Section label="BASIC_CREDS" layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="username" type="String" required="false"/>
        <Field name="password" type="password" required="false"/>
      </Section>
    </Section>
    <Section layout="vertical" label="OAUTH_2_CREDS">
      <Field name="grant_type" type="String">
        <AllowedValues>
          <Option value="PASSWORD" label="PASSWORD"/>
          <Option value="CLIENT_CREDENTIALS" label="CLIENT_CREDS"/>
          <Option value="REFRESH_TOKEN" label="REF_TOKEN"/>
          <Option value="JWT_BEARER" label="JWT_BEARER_TOKEN"/>
          <Option value="SAML_BEARER_ASSERTION" label="SAML_BEARER_ASSERTION"/>
        </AllowedValues>
      </Field>
      <Section layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="resourceOwnerUsername" type="String"/>
        <Field name="resourceOwnerPassword" type="password"/>
      </Section>
      <Field name="token_url" type="String" required="false"/>
      <Section layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="client_id" type="String"/>
        <Field name="client_secret" type="password"/>
      </Section>
      <Field name="refresh_token" type="password" required="false"/>
      <Field name="private_key" type="TextArea" secret="true"/>
      <Field name="private_key_password" type="password"/>
      <Field name="saml_assertion_url" type="String" required="false"/>
      <Field name="saml_request_body" type="TextArea" secret="false"/>
    </Section>
    <Section layout="horizontal" label="API_TOKEN">
      <Section layout="horizontal">
        <Field name="accesstoken" type="password" required="false"/>
      </Section>
    </Section>
  </Section>
  <Section layout="vertical" label="SERVER_HOST">
    <Field name="genericWebServiceBaseUrl" type="String" required="true"/>
  </Section>
  <Section layout="horizontal" label="COMMON_CONFIGURATION">
    <Section layout="horizontal">
      <Field name="enableStatus" type="String" required="false"/>
      <Field name="lockStatus" type="String" required="false"/>
      <Field name="timeoutInSeconds" type="String" required="false"/>
    </Section>
  </Section>
  <Section layout="advanced">
    <Section layout="vertical" label="JWT_SETTINGS">
      <Field name="oAuthJwtHeader" readOnly="false" type="keyValue" keyLabel="Key" valueLabel="Value"/>
      <Field name="oAuthJwtPayload" readOnly="false" type="keyValue" keyLabel="Key" valueLabel="Value"/>
    </Section>
    <Section layout="horizontal" label="CLIENT_CERTIFICATE_SETTINGS">
      <Field name="clientCertificate" type="TextArea" secret="true"/>
      <Field name="clientKeySpec" type="TextArea" secret="true"/>
    </Section>
  </Section>
  <Section label="HTTP_OPERATIONS">
    <Field name="connectionParameters" readOnly="false" type="webserviceFieldEditor" required="false"/>
  </Section>
</Form>

connectionParameters.beforeRule: Oracle HCM WS Before Aggregation Operation
Oracle HCM WS Before Aggregation Operation

correlationConfigDetails.name: Oracle HCM Employees Account Correlation Config
